Get access to all content for only
Please select male or female voice. The content is slightly different since some aspects of Thai language depend upon the gender of the speaker. You can change later in the top right options menu.
To access the contents at any time, swipe from the left edge or tap the top left menu icon. Touch a phrase to hear the audio.

"This app uses a system of transliteration to represent Thai words with the English alphabet. Tones are marked with the following accents:
e - mid tone è - low tone ê - falling tone é - high tone ĕ - rising tone
See the 'Tone Practice' section under 'Basics' for more information."
